item.title: -PI- help plox?
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

sorry im rlly tired but i jsut threw this together:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup (ITEMID)")) { c.sendMessage("You Are not aloud to Spawn This item, Sorry.."); } else { if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup (ITEMID)")) { c.sendMessage("You Are not aloud to Spawn This item, Sorry.."); } else { if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup (ITEMID)")) { c.sendMessage("You Are not aloud to Spawn This item, Sorry.."); } else { if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup (ITEMID)")) { c.sendMessage("You Are not aloud to Spawn This item, Sorry.."); } else { if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup (ITEMID)")) { c.sendMessage("You Are not aloud to Spawn This item, Sorry.."); } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Incorrect Try ::pickup (ItemID) (item AMOUNT)"); } } catch(Exception e) { 
			}
		}</blockquote>

in the (ITEMID) Put the item you dont want spawned, have fun. (sorry if its a shitty job.)
